page.title: 19EID-UL-FITR:Muslim Sheffield
page.content: On Wednesday 19th.June,1985 I woke up really excited because it was Eid. {Eid-ul-Fitr}comes at the end of {Ramadan,}the fast which Muslims keep for 30 days, between sunrise and sunset. I rushed downstairs and Mum gave me my new{shalwar kameez}(trousers and tunic) and sandals which she had brought me from Pakistan. My dad and brother came back from the Mosque where they had been since nine to read the{Koran,}our holy book. They sat down and ate some coloured rice, and then gave us some Eid money. We also sent some money to our family in Pakistan so that they could have a good time. Then we went around to see our relatives to exchange gifts and money with them too.
